alert.note: Alert for Morton; Oliver (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 9:59PM CDT until August 01 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: The National Weather Service in Bismarck has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Morton County in south central North Dakota... Southwestern Oliver County in south central North Dakota... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 959 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles southwest of Hannover to 9 miles west of New Salem, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... New Salem around 1025 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Fish Creek Dam, Sweet Briar Lake, Judson and Crown Butte Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
